title: BRIEF-Raubex Group Says HEPS For HY Period To Be Between 60% And 80% Higher Than Previous Corresponding Period
text:
BRIEF-Raubex Group Says HEPS For HY Period To Be Between 60% And 80% Higher Than Previous Corresponding Period

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 03, 2019 08:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Raubex Group Says HEPS For HY Period To Be Between 60% And 80% Higher Than Previous Corresponding Period Oct 3 (Reuters) - Raubex Group Ltd : * TRADING STATEMENT IN RESPECT OF THE SIX MONTH PERIOD ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 * HEPS FOR HY PERIOD TO BE BETWEEN 60% AND 80% HIGHER THAN HEPS FROM PREVIOUS CORRESPONDING PERIOD * HEPS FOR HY PERIOD TO BE BETWEEN 57,1 CENTS AND 64,3 CENTS (H1 2019: 35,7 CENTS) * EPS FOR HY PERIOD TO BE BETWEEN 60,7 CENTS AND 67,8 CENTS (H1 2019: 35,7 CENTS) * "MATERIALS DIVISION EXPERIENCED CHALLENGING HY WITH CONSIDERABLE MARGIN PRESSURE AND FALL IN OPERATING PROFIT COMPARED TO LAST YEAR" * INFRASTRUCTURE DIVISION EXPERIENCED STRONG GROWTH IN HY COMPARED TO LAST YEAR

BRIEF-Raubex Group Says HEPS For HY Period To Be Between 60% And 80% Higher Than Previous Corresponding Period
description: BRIEF-Raubex Group Says HEPS For HY Period To Be Between 60% And 80% Higher Than Previous Corresponding Period
